description: Extremely detailed slot mapping for multi-product PSURs with separate tables, charts, and product-specific data
key_features: Support for multiple products (up to 3) in single PSUR
Separate sales tables for each product with custom regions
Individual chart/figure descriptions for yearly and monthly sales
Product-specific device descriptions, classifications, and regulatory data
Separate RMF numbers and catalog numbers per product

examples: product_2_description_para3 → Third paragraph of product 2 description

data_collection_period.format: DD Month YYYY to DD Month YYYY

product_1_description_para1.example: ORIGIO® Sperm Wash is a colourless, non-viscous solution contained in 10- and 60-ml transparent Polyethylene Terephthalate Glycol (PETG) bottle...

product_1_description_para2.example: The device incorporates human albumin solution (HAS) and gentamicin sulphate (antibiotic), both considered as ancillary medicinal substances.

product_1_description_para3.example: HAS is derived from human blood constituents.

product_1_description_para4.example: Gentamicin sulphate is produced via fermentation using, among other, fish peptone...

product_1_intended_purpose.example: ORIGIO® Sperm Wash is applied in ART treatments intended for washing of sperm, the isolation of motile viable sperm by swim-up method...

product_2_intended_purpose.example: Sperm Preparation Medium is applied in ART treatments intended for washing of sperm and isolation of motile viable sperm by swim-up method.

product_1_indications_para1.example: The ORIGIO® Sperm Wash is intended for Assisted Reproductive Technology (ART) treatment of persons/couples undergoing IVF treatment...

product_1_indications_para2.example: Patients are all persons/couples who have been assessed suitable by a gynecologist to undergo IVF.

grouping_justification.guidance: Explain why products are grouped per MDR Article 86
grouping_justification.example: According to (EU) 2017/745 article 86(1), a same PSUR may cover a 'category or group of devices'. ORIGIO® Sperm Wash, Sperm Preparation Medium and Quinn's® Sperm Washing Medium are grouped in this PSUR094 as they share the same Basic UDI-DI, same target population, certified under same MDR certificate...

grouping_note.example: Note: These three products were previously covered in separate PSURs (PSUR094 - ORIGIO® Sperm Wash, PSUR030- Sperm Preparation Medium and PSUR202 - Quinn's® Sperm Washing Medium).

leading_device_rationale.example: As all the devices included in this PSUR belong to the same risk classification, the leading devices have been selected based on their cumulative sales in EEA+TR+XI and worldwide sales

product_1_market_history_para1.example: ORIGIO® Sperm Wash has been available and used by ART clinics in Europe since 2016 when it was first introduced to the market.

product_1_market_history_para2.example: Apart from a long history on the market, ORIGIO® Sperm Wash forms a part of a group of devices characterized by common and stable designs...

product_1_market_history_para3.example: May 2008, a first step towards regulation of ART media as medical devices in Europe was published...

product_1_sales_{REGION}_col1.description: Sales for Product 1 in {REGION} for first preceding period

product_1_sales_{REGION}_col2.description: Sales for Product 1 in {REGION} for second preceding period

product_1_sales_{REGION}_col3.description: Sales for Product 1 in {REGION} for third preceding period

product_1_sales_{REGION}_col4.description: Sales for Product 1 in {REGION} for current period

product_1_sales_{REGION}_col5.description: Percentage of global sales for Product 1 in {REGION}

sales_table_slots.note: Each product can have custom regions in its sales table

product_1_yearly_sales_analysis.guidance: Describe yearly sales trend with actual figures, highest/lowest, average
product_1_yearly_sales_analysis.example: The sales figures recorded are 47,533, 49,637, 50,472, and 54,279, showing a general upward trend with a slight dip in the second period. The average sales across these periods is 50,480.

product_1_monthly_sales_analysis.guidance: Describe monthly sales with all 13 months of data, highest/lowest, average
product_1_monthly_sales_analysis.example: The monthly sales figures recorded are 4,113, 3,677, 6,233, 4,120, 4,369, 3,314, 3,673, 3,344, 3,697, 4,722, 3,643, 4,501, and 4,873, showing fluctuations with the highest being 6,233 and the lowest being 3,314. The average monthly sales across these periods is 4,175.

product_2_yearly_sales_analysis.example: The yearly sales figures recorded are 28,867, 28,075, 27,921, and 28,368, showing slight fluctuations over the years...

examples: Figure 1. Yearly sales graph for ORIGIO® Sperm Wash from 01 January 2024 to 31 January 2025
Figure 2. Monthly sales for ORIGIO® Sperm Wash from 01 January 2024 to 31 January 2025
Figure 3. Yearly sales graph for Sperm Preparation Medium...
Figure 4. Monthly sales for Sperm Preparation Medium...
Figure 5. Yearly sales graph for Quinn's® Sperm Washing Medium...
Figure 6. Monthly sales for Quinn's® Sperm Washing Medium...

section_d_content.guidance: Include Tables 2, 3, 4 with IMDRF coding for each product if needed
components: Table 4 - Health Effects by Investigation Conclusion
Table 6 - Feedback by Type and Source

section_f_content.guidance: Complaint rates for each product separately if grouped

section_m_content.guidance: Six required subsections a) through f)
required_subsections: d) New or Emerging Risks and Benefits

multi_product_workflow: 3. For each product, fill all product-specific slots
4. Create separate sales tables with appropriate regions
5. Generate chart descriptions with actual data
7. Ensure grouping justification if multiple products
8. Validate all cross-references to product names are consistent
sales_table_population: 1. Identify regions for each product (can be different)
2. For each region row, populate columns 1-5
3. Column 5 should be percentage with 3 decimal places
4. Worldwide row must sum all regions
quality_checks: All product_N_name slots use same name consistently
Sales tables have correct regions for each product
Chart figure numbers sequential (1-6 for 3 products)
Classification rules accurate for each product
